version_description:
User Lists improvements:
• Release Date sort is back!
• In List Order sort, item numbers show again
• Date Added sort shows date items were added
• Your Lists now shows all list types, is sortable, and editable
• List reordering is easier to use
• iPad list shows list item descriptions again

We've also rebuilt the title page to be faster and more reliable.

Bugs fixed:
• Refine page would sometimes never finish loading
• Unable to add to a user name list
• Search showed "No Results" while loading

• Known For now includes role and years of involvement
• Celebrity lists now show top Known For role
• Title Connections now lets you see untruncated text
• Watch Now buttons now show in lists when filtering by Amazon Video
• Fixed list filtering to movies in theaters
• Standardized header text colors on name and title pages
• Updated search results on iPad

• Fixes broken Forgot Password link on IMDb sign in page
• Fixes crash when linking to some full news articles

• Your Ratings can now sort by Release Date
• Fixed sizing issue with iPad rotation of homepage
• Fixed crash when adding an item to a name list
• Fixed the Watchlist summary sometimes incorrectly showing zero items

NEW this release:
We’ve updated our look in honor of Comic-Con!
Follow all the breaking Comic-Con news in our special Comic-Con section.
Be sure to check out:
· IMDb Trending: a dynamic visualization of the most popular and fastest rising comic book related movies, TV shows, and stars.
· Fan IQ: lets you answer questions about your favorite comic book related TV shows, movies, and actors, and then share your score and challenge your friends.

We’ve updated our look and added features in honor of Comic-Con!

New in v6.17:
• Fixed loading of large lists to no longer block other content from loading
• Suppressed invalid critics review links that would cause a crash
• Fixed crash when viewing some birth/death place locations on a map
• Fixed a few other crashing issues
Updating the app's icon

• Improved search results
• Updated video player experience
• Tapping on the heart in the corner of any video lets others know that you liked it
• Dark mode is now the default
• Fixed crash when refreshing recommendations

Bug fixes

New in v6.18
• Improved search results
• Updated video player experience
• Tapping on the heart in the corner of any video lets others know that you liked it
• Dark mode is now the default
• Fixed crash when refreshing recommendations

IMDb now supports iOS 10 and has an iMessage app!
• Search IMDb in iMessage and send links to showtimes and movie, TV, or celebrity pages
• New Top Rated Indian Movies page
• iPad Pro screen size now supported
• 3D touch added to all homepage links

We've also fixed a few things:
• When buying movie tickets, expired times now gray out
• Photo viewer no longer hides the top portion of some images in portrait mode
• Accessibility improvements on the home page
• Long cinema names no longer overlap other text
• When editing a user list, the privacy toggle is now labeled

• Coming Soon TV. See when new and returning TV shows air.
• Added haptic feedback for iPhone 7.
• Movie and TV pages now load faster.
• Dynamic Type support. Enlarge text on many subpages using Settings app > General > Accessibility > Larger Text.

Fixes:
• 3D touch previews are more reliable now.
• iMessage app now works after changing device orientation.
• Parental guide now loads properly for non-English languages.
• User lists now immediately reflect list privacy changes.
• Fixed several common crash issues.

Would you like to be the first to use new versions of the IMDb app? Send an email to iphone@imdb.com and ask to be a beta tester.

• Sign in with Amazon instantly using the Amazon Shopping app.
• Rebuilt Your History page now shows up to 100 items.
• Your showtimes location is now shared with the iMessage app.
• The app also now saves your custom showtimes location permanently.

• Photo viewer now scrolls in a loop between the first and last item.
• Your Recommendations design updates.
• Redesigned Sign In page.

Fixes:
• Your History clear button on iPad no longer crashes.
• Issue where Your History fills up then stops adding new items.
• Holding down back button now correctly opens Your History page.

• Improved search results.
• Cast and crew listings can now be sorted by name.
• iMessage app sends better formatted messages, and tapping on a message shows more detail.
• iMessage app now lets you send movie showing times per cinema, plot summary, and a link to the trailer.
Bug fixes

Updates to Your Watchlist
• Now you can quickly view ways to watch, rate titles, and more directly from your Watchlist.
• We have improved the Watchlist icon that allows you to track what you want to watch on title pages.

New features
• Filmography viewed by role can now be sorted and filtered
• Cast and crew has a new popularity sort option

Redesigned pages
• Photo galleries
• Featured lists

We’ve made some additional improvements to the Watchlist experience.

IMDb is the best place to discover great movies and TV shows, and Watchlist makes it easy to keep track of what you want to watch. Do you think we're doing something well? Is there something we've overlooked? Please post your feedback at https://getsatisfaction.com/imdb/categories/imdb_ios_app

* We’ve updated the search experience to make it easier to find the right title or person.  We’ll also display any Recent Searches you have.
* We’ve updated our push notifications options. Visit Settings and then scroll down to Notifications to view or update your current subscriptions.
* We’ve fixed a bug that caused your list of lists to sort incorrectly.
* Various bug fixes and performance enhancements

Release notes:
* We’ve increased the size of movie posters and improved image quality.
* We’ve fixed a bug causing some people to receive the push notification screen more than once. Visit Settings and then scroll down to Notifications to view or update your current subscriptions.
* We’ve fixed a bug that caused the wrong image to display in search results.
* We've fixed a few crashes.
We've fixed a bug that prevented lists from displaying, and another that caused some people to have trouble opening the app after changing their password.
When viewing awards, you can once again sort by nominee and by title. We've also updated sorting in Movie and TV cast lists to use last name rather than first name.

We've updated the trailer and video experience on the homepage, as well as the Movies, TV, and Celebrities landing pages. Quickly explore and watch the latest trailers, clips, interviews, and IMDb exclusives. We’ve also improved our ratings experience to make it easier than ever to rate movies and shows. Tap the Share icon on the top right of the ratings screen to share your ratings with friends. Finally, we've fixed the Search, Showtimes, Watchlist, and Feedback shortcuts you'll find if you have if you have 3D Touch enabled on your device and press on the IMDb icon.

This update fixes a problem that prevents the app from starting for some users.

We've also updated the trailer and video experience on the homepage, as well as the Movies, TV, and Celebrities landing pages. Quickly explore and watch the latest trailers, clips, interviews, and IMDb exclusives. We’ve also improved our ratings experience to make it easier than ever to rate movies and shows. Tap the Share icon on the top right of the ratings screen to share your ratings with friends. Finally, we've fixed the Search, Showtimes, Watchlist, and Feedback shortcuts you'll find if you have if you have 3D Touch enabled on your device and press on the IMDb icon.

On title and name pages, we’ve created separate Videos and Images sections so that you have access more content more quickly.  We’ve also increased our full search results from 20 to 100 items.  Finally, we’ve updated our Awards & Events experience. Get complete coverage of the annual awards season from the Golden Globes to the Academy Awards as well as the latest updates from the festival circuit.

We’ve updated our video experience, making playlists more discoverable. Tap the Up Next tab on most video pages to easily find and watch related videos. Also, we’ve fixed a few bugs in this release:
* Title pages show Director and Writers along with the Top Billed Cast. 
* Tapping Recommended For You from your profile works again. 
Thanks for all of your feedback and bug reports - we appreciate it!
We've updated our push notification choices, fixed some bugs, and improved performance of the app. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some additional performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some additional performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements, including a fix for the iMessage App not loading. Thanks for using IMDb!

Would you like to be the first to use new versions of the IMDb app? Send an email to iphone@imdb.com and ask to be a beta tester.
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've updated the app for iOS 11, fixed some bugs, and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

This update fixes an issue with viewing notifications in the app. 

We've updated the app for iOS 11, fixed some bugs, and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
Thanks for using IMDb! We've fixed some bugs, including a few accessibility issues.
Updated for the iPhone X! Thanks for using IMDb.

Now you can dive deep into Movies, TV, and Celebs, explore the latest Awards & Events, and find your Watchlist from the top of the homepage. We've updated the user review experience, making it easier to find all the reviews and commentary in one place. We've also fixed several iPad bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated user reviews so you can now sort by most helpful, review date, and review rating. You can choose to exclude reviews with spoilers. We've also made a number of performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated Lists with the ability to add or edit notes to any movie, show, or person. On any list item, just tap the menu and then "Add Note" or "Edit Note" to get started. We've also updated news. Now you have access to our entire history of news, not just the last 100 articles. Finally, we've fixed a couple of bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated Lists with the ability to add or edit notes to any movie, show, or person. On any list item, just tap the menu and then "Add Note" or "Edit Note" to get started. We've also updated news. Now you have access to our entire history of news, not just the last 100 articles. Finally, we've fixed a couple of bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've added some new gestures to allow you to navigate the app better - you can now swipe 'back' from most parts of the page, and can swipe down to dismiss the photo and video viewer. We've also added more coverage to the TV Genres page, and fixed some small bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We now remember the last page you viewed before leaving the app. When you re-open IMDb, we'll return you to that page (within 90 minutes). We've also fixed some bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!

v8.6.1
Bug fixes

v8.6
We now remember the last page you viewed before leaving the app. When you re-open IMDb, we'll return you to that page (within 90 minutes). We've also fixed some bugs and made some additional performance improvements that should make the app load faster. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!
We've fixed some bugs and made some performance improvements. Thanks for using IMDb!

We’ve made a number of updates in our newest release:
• We’ve brought back the option to mark Recommendations as Not Interested!
• The user reviews page for movies and TV loads faster and has more sort options.
• We fixed a bug impacting buying tickets for future movie releases.
• And we’ve made loading title and name pages faster!

We’ve made a number of updates in our newest release:
• We’ve brought back the option to mark Recommendations as Not Interested!
• The user reviews page for movies and TV loads faster and has more sort options.
• We fixed a bug impacting buying tickets for future movie releases.
• And we’ve made loading title and name pages faster!
• In 8.10.1, we fixed the notification settings page toggle switches.

We added one-time "Tips" to help new users get the most out of the app. We also made a number of improvements to speed up the app and improve usability (mostly in our network layer) - as Maverick and Goose said, "I feel the need... the need for speed!" We also fixed a bug impacting voiceover accessibility in title User Reviews. Enjoy!
This version contains a fix for a crashing bug

We've added the ability to see all the reviews from a single user. Find a reviewer you like from any title page, tap the three dots, and check out what other movies or shows they liked! You can also sort and filter their - and your - reviews. We also added a fix for a crash impacting users on iOS 10.3.3, and improved the video experience on iPhone X.

We've made getting recommendations for movies and shows easier - try it out by tapping the side navigation and then Rate and Get Recommendations! We've also made filtering on lists easier with one-tap buttons along the top row. Thanks for using IMDb!
We’ve added easier filtering to most of our lists. We’ve also updated our video player, making videos load faster and play more smoothly. Thanks for using IMDb!

Check out the new Watchlist tab, with pre-filtered sections of your Watchlist and lists of recommended titles to find great shows and movies to watch. We now support iOS 12 - including Siri Shortcuts for your Watchlist, ratings, Showtimes, and more! We fixed a couple bugs (on Trivia and Connections pages) and updated linking in photo galleries and quotes pages. Thanks for using IMDb!

Check out the new Watchlist tab, with pre-filtered sections of your Watchlist and lists of recommended titles to find great shows and movies to watch. We now support iOS 12 - including Siri Shortcuts for your Watchlist, ratings, Showtimes, and more! We fixed a couple bugs (on Trivia and Connections pages) and updated linking in photo galleries and quotes pages. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated our Trivia, Quotes, Goofs, and Crazy Credits pages on movies and shows to allow you to sort, filter, and vote on each item more easily. We've also fixed some bugs in lists throughout the app. Thanks for using IMDb!
Mostly under-the-hood changes in this release to improve speed and reliability. Thanks for being an IMDb customer!

We gave our people and title pages a little facelift - check it out, and let us know what you think! We also added Latest Trailers and News to the Watchlist tab, and added a Recommendations experience to help you find great shows and movies to watch. Thanks for using IMDb!

We gave our people and title pages a little facelift - check it out, and let us know what you think! We also added Latest Trailers and News to the Watchlist tab, and added a Recommendations experience to help you find great shows and movies to watch. Thanks for using IMDb!

In v9.3.1, we fixed an issue where the app wasn't always opening on iOS 10 and 11.
This release contains some minor improvements and bug fixes. Thanks for using IMDb!
This release contains a fix that was causing some users to experience login failures. Thanks for using IMDb!

Check out the new 'Find Movies and TV Shows' tab after tapping the search bar - you can select filters like genre, year, and IMDb rating to get a list of titles that match your criteria. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated the design of the Parents' Guide! You can now see color-coded ratings by category, add your vote on the severity of each item, and contribute new items to the guide. On people pages, we now show you movies and shows that person appears in that you've rated. We also added previous Find Titles & TV Shows searches to the Recent Searches page. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated the design of the Parents' Guide! You can now see color-coded ratings by category, add your vote on the severity of each item, and contribute new items to the guide. On people pages, we now show you movies and shows that person appears in that you've rated. We also added previous Find Titles & TV Shows searches to the Recent Searches page. Thanks for using IMDb!
You can now tap genres, languages, and countries on movie and show pages to see lists of popular related titles! And, as always, bug fixes.

We've added some new gestures to allow you to navigate the app better - you can now swipe 'back' from most parts of the page, and can swipe down to dismiss the photo and video viewer. We've also added more coverage to the TV Genres page, and fixed some small bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've added some new gestures to allow you to navigate the app better - you can now swipe 'back' from most parts of the page, and can swipe down to dismiss the photo and video viewer. We've also added more coverage to the TV Genres page, and fixed some small bugs. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've added some small improvements to the TV Episodes experience - but most of the changes in this update are under the hood. Bug fixes and performance updates throughout the app. Thanks for using IMDb!
...Bueller? Bueller? It might seem like you can't find any updates in this version - and you'd be right! Mostly bug fixes. Thanks for using IMDb!

Did you know Matt LeBlanc only had $11 to his name when he auditioned for Friends? And can you quote Chandler's "most interesting" line? We made it easier to see ALL of the cool movie/show info with fast tabbing between sections. We also made some slick improvements to our one-tap filters on lists - we hope you like them!

Did you know Matt LeBlanc only had $11 to his name when he auditioned for Friends? And can you quote Chandler's "most interesting" line? We made it easier to see ALL of the cool movie/show info with fast tabbing between sections. We also made some slick improvements to our one-tap filters on lists - we hope you like them!

"Never show anyone. They'll beg you and they'll flatter you for the secret, but as soon as you give it up... you'll be nothing to them." Christian Bale was right in The Prestige - you won't see the changes in this update, and we're not telling! (Bug fixes and under-the-hood changes). Thanks for using IMDb!

"Never show anyone. They'll beg you and they'll flatter you for the secret, but as soon as you give it up... you'll be nothing to them." Christian Bale was right in The Prestige - you won't see the changes in this update, and we're not telling! (Bug fixes and under-the-hood changes). Thanks for using IMDb!

(In 9.12.1, we also fixed a crash)

We're in the midst of some longer-term projects right now, so you won't see too many changes in the app this time around. We made some small updates to a number of pages to make them load faster, and fixed a few bugs. Stay tuned - thanks for using IMDb!

We're in the midst of some longer-term projects right now, so you won't see too many changes in the app this time around. We made some small updates to a number of pages to make them load faster, and fixed a few bugs. Stay tuned - thanks for using IMDb!
We caught a couple bugs in the last release with sharing photos - those are fixed. We've also updated our box office data to be more timely and comprehensive. Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated our User Activity page (the little icon in the top right of the screen) to make it easier to access your Watchlist, Ratings, Recent History and more. Check it out! Thanks for using IMDb!

We've updated our User Activity page (the little icon in the top right of the screen) to make it easier to access your Watchlist, Ratings, Recent History and more. Check it out! Thanks for using IMDb!

In 9.15.1, we fixed an issue where some people didn't receive notifications.
We've updated our movies and shows pages to show you when you can watch on IMDb TV, Amazon Prime Video Channels, HBO, Starz, Showtime, and PBS! Thanks for using IMDb!

We've moved our navigation to the bottom of the app! You can now access Home, Search, IMDb TV (in the US), Video (outside of the US) and You pages from anywhere in the app. Double-tap the search icon to initiate a search, and log in or register to start building your Ratings and Watchlist. Thanks for using IMDb!

Wondering what to watch? Trust IMDb. We’ve created an all-new experience to help you. You’ll find Fan Favorites and Streaming Picks to help you make choices on where and when to watch films and TV every day. We also fixed a variety of bugs. Enjoy!
We fixed a variety of bugs. Enjoy!
We fixed a variety of bugs. Enjoy!

This release includes additional filtering for Watch Options including filtering by in theaters, streaming subscriptions, streaming rent/buy, on TV, on disc, or coming soon. We also fixed a number of bugs.

Here's what new in this release:
• iOS Dark Mode support! Change Settings > Theme to "System Default" and the app will always use the system-wide appearance setting (iOS 13 only)
• Search History now shows the results you most recently visited
• We've added Top Box Office to the homepage

Thank you for using IMDb!

Here's what new in this release:
• iOS Dark Mode support! Change Settings > Theme to "System Default" and the app will always use the system-wide appearance setting (iOS 13 only)
• Search History now shows the results you most recently visited
• We've added Top Box Office to the homepage

In 10.1.1, we've fixed the cursor to be visible on contribution pages.
You might notice some changes around here. We've updated (most of) the app's text and page styling, as well as improved our list experiences. Hope you enjoy - thanks for using IMDb!
You might notice some changes around here. We've updated (most of) the app's text and page styling, as well as improved our list experiences. Hope you enjoy - thanks for using IMDb!

“That rug really tied the room together.” You’ll notice that we did a little remodel on movies and shows pages to help you easily discover what to watch next. You can also now simultaneously rate and remove titles in your Watchlist. Behind the scenes, we fixed several bugs to improve performance and your overall experience. Hope you enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

"12345? That’s amazing, I’ve got the same combination on my luggage!” Mel Brooks kept it simple, and you can too with the addition of Sign In with Apple to sign in and manage your IMDb account. We also fixed bugs to improve performance and your overall experience. Hope you enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!
We added a few improvements to the Favorite Person page – but most update changes are under the hood. Bug fixes and performance updates throughout the app. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!
We added a few improvements to the Favorite Person page – but most update changes are under the hood. Bug fixes and performance updates throughout the app. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

Like Keanu Reeves in Speed, we have to keep our app moving fast… which is why we’ve improved our loading speed on title and people pages! Hope it feels snappy. We’ve also added recommendations from your Watchlist to the homepage – get inspired this weekend (or register and create a Watchlist if you haven’t already). Thanks for using IMDb!

This release includes several under-the-hood updates, so you may not notice too many changes this go around. We updated a number of pages, fixed bugs, and improved overall performance. Stay tuned for what’s next, and thanks for using IMDb!

“There may be something there that wasn’t there before.” Like Belle's newfound emotions for the Beast, we think you’ll fall for what's new in this release. The refreshed Improve Top Picks page (click "Improve top picks" on the home tab) lets you rate and watchlist popular movies and shows to improve personalized recommendations. We updated the Parents' Guide section and added a "runtime" filter to refine lists when time matters. We also fixed bugs to enhance performance and your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

“No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.” Like Robin Williams inspiring students in Dead Poets Society to contribute a verse to life's powerful play, we empower you to contribute to IMDb. The “contribute to this page” feature on movie and people pages enables you to edit and improve IMDb to benefit everyone. We also fixed bugs to enhance performance and your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

The most important commodity that I know of is information.” We agree with Gordon Gekko’s Wall Street remark and know he’d love IMDb’s new home screen widgets to keep his favorite entertainment information at his fingertips. We hope you do too. With iOS 14, you can add IMDb widgets to your home screen to glance at latest information on what to watch, entertainment news, popular trailers, and celebrity birthdays. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

Perfect people can’t change. Jack was always getting better, stronger.” Natalie Portman as Jackie Kennedy in Jackie reminded us that even Camelot was always fixing its imperfections. To continue to get better and stronger for you, in this release, we focused on bug fixes and performance improvements to enhance your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

"Mini Me? Where are you? Could someone put a fricken bell on him or something?" Dr. Evil reminded us in Austin Powers that miniature clones are hard to resist, which is why we launched mini-title pages on the homepage. Now you can click on any homepage carousel -- such as Fan Favorites and others -- to seamlessly scroll, preview, and even rate and watchlist movies and TV shows when deciding what to watch next. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

“I don't think any word can explain a man's life,” Thompson famously said at the end of Citizen Kane. While he knew “Rosebud” wouldn’t explain Charlie Kane’s life, he’d agree a word or two can describe a film. That’s why we added new homepage carousels that rotate among dozens of genres and subgenres – such as “Spaghetti Western,” “Mockumentary,” and more – to help you find something interesting to watch next. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

“I don't think any word can explain a man's life,” Thompson famously said at the end of Citizen Kane. While he knew “Rosebud” wouldn’t explain Charlie Kane’s life, he’d agree a word or two can describe a film. That’s why we added new homepage carousels that rotate among dozens of genres and subgenres – such as “Spaghetti Western,” “Mockumentary,” and more – to help you find something interesting to watch next. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

We updated the Favorite people section on the You page to make it easier to keep up with your preferred directors, actors, and more. We also made several under-the-hood-updates to a number of pages, fixed bugs, and improved overall performance. Stay tuned for what's next, and thanks for using IMDb!

“Ah, introduce people with thoughtful details.” Bridget Jones’s imagination was a little cheeky when introducing Perpetua and Darcy, but she reminded us the value of an informed introduction and recommendation. Now on celebrity name pages, you’ll notice recommended titles – under the section “You might also like” – based on movies and shows that feature them and which you’ve rated. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

"Whatever else anything is, it ought to begin by being personal." Kathleen nailed it in the film You've Got Mail when she reminded Joe Fox that every action – even in business – is personal. It’s why we added personalized push notifications that, based on your IMDb preferences and engagement, recommend individualized movies, shows, popular genre titles, and more to help you decide what to watch next. To enable personalized notifications, click the You (or Sign in) tab -> Settings -> Notifications -> Recommendations. You’ll then receive IMDb recommendations curated just for you. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience. Enjoy, and thanks for using IMDb!

“I gotta get outta here pronto, I got a Stage 5 clinger.” In Wedding Crashers, Vince Vaughn soon learns Isla Fisher’s theatrical clinginess brings his life direction and love. To help direct how you navigate IMDb, homepage section headers — such as “What to Watch” and “Explore What’s Streaming” — now cling atop the page as you scroll the latest in entertainment. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience — thanks for using IMDb!

Here's some highlights of what's new in this version:
- Use the text size setting under Accessibility in the Settings app to make text sizes larger
- The sign in and create account pages now display in the correct language

We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience — thanks for using IMDb!

Here's some highlights of what's new in this version:
- Displays more localized content in Chinese, Japanese, and Korean
- Use the text size setting under Accessibility in the Settings app to make text sizes larger
- The sign in and create account pages now display in the correct language

We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience — thanks for using IMDb!
You can now clear your history in Settings. We also made it easier to copy the title of a movie/show or a person's name by tapping on the text at the top of its page. Thanks for using IMDb!

We’ve added a rating histogram on user review pages. Plus, signed out users now get to share in the joy of customized top picks. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience — thanks for using IMDb!

We’ve added a rating histogram on user review pages. Plus, signed out users now get to share in the joy of customized top picks. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience — thanks for using IMDb!
We’ve fixed several important issues and crashes in this release. Thank you for using IMDb!
This release fixes a crash that could occur when using the Video player in poor network conditions. We also improved the results for some of our Homepage widgets. Thanks for using IMDb!
We’ve added more account options to Settings. We also fixed bugs to improve your overall experience — thanks for using IMDb!

In this release, we’ve added two ways to play trailers from a person’s filmography. One button appears in the Filmography section that will start a playlist of videos when pressed. Another play button appears under each title on the Filmography list page.

We’ve also addressed a few major bugs. Thank you for using IMDb!
